name: Association of European Cancer Leagues
goal:
ECL is a non-profit association and an alliance of national and regional cancer leagues.

ECL's vision is for a Europe Free from Cancer

The main goals of the association are:

to promote a healthy lifestyle for all European citizens;
to enhance access to cancer screening programmes;
to ensure greater and cross-border access to diagnostics,
treatment and support;
to advocate for the establishment and implementation
of national cancer control programmes

We also advocate on important issues relevant for cancer leagues and the patient organisations they support, at the EU and the wider-European level.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives: Cancer control, tobacco control, non communicable diseases (NCD), EU Joint Action on Cancer Control, EU Joint Action on Rare Cancers.  We are commissioned by the European Commission to communicate the European Code Against Cancer (www.cancercode.eu) through an EU Operating Grant.
